**Welcome** to the dev-version of the [library flip in CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/flip/index.html)



To install this github version type (in R):

# install.packages("devtools") # if you don't already have it.

library(devtools)

install_github("flip", "livioivil")

library(flip)
